name: Bounce Back
summary: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.
description:
You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience. Don't increase the value of your wounded condition due to losing the dying condition.Traits

Human: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
